suite.name: OJT-activity

test.name: test

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Password
kw.msg: Temporally setting log level to: NONE
kw.doc: Types the given password into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Alert Should Be Present
kw.doc: Verifies that an alert is present and by default, accepts it.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Verify Edit Functionality

kw.doc: Verifies table contains text ``expected``.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Sleep

This keyword is for verifying the edit/update functionality for the student information. I will change the last name of the student and check if the changes are saved

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: This test suite is for the Student Registration System for login validation,logout functionality, student search functionality and validation and activate/deactivate button functionality

suite.doc: This test suite is for login validation for the Student Registration System Auhort: Neovern Enricoso
